name: Mirror Madness (DerpGio)
description:
Have some fun blasting space foes with the power or reflective mirror lasers! In this game you will have many foes thrown at you with different difficulties, and you must use your space cannon and the help of powerful mirrors to destroy them. These mirrors are specially made and are able to enhance your lasers at every touch. Do you have what it takes to get through the final boss?

!Notes:

Collisions and reflecting can get finnicky, if a wave seems over but doesn't end then try shooting at the corners because an enemy may be stuck there :L

Use AD to move

Not explained in the tutorial, but veering out of bounds with the player will make you wrap around the sides.

I don't know why the Unity splash screen doesn't show up, and I didn't do anything that would modify that so I'm disclaiming here that THIS PROJECT WAS MADE WITH UNITY GAME ENGINE
